zone-policy {
    zone PUBLIC {
        description 'The Internet'
        interface eth0
        from PRIVATE {
            firewall {
                name PUBLIC-from-PRIVATE-v4
                ipv6-name PUBLIC-from-PRIVATE-v6
            }
        }
    }
    zone PRIVATE {
        description 'The local private LAN'
        interface eth1
        from PUBLIC {
            firewall {
                name PRIVATE-from-PUBLIC-v4
                ipv6-name PRIVATE-from-PUBLIC-v6
            }
        }
    }
}
firewall {
    name PUBLIC-from-PRIVATE-v4 {
        default-action accept
    }
    ipv6-name PUBLIC-from-PRIVATE-v6 {
        default-action accept
    }
    name PRIVATE-from-PUBLIC-v4 {
        default-action reject
        rule 2 {
            description 'Allow Internet to ping LAN'
            action accept
            protocol icmp
        }
    }
    ipv6-name PRIVATE-from-PUBLIC-v6 {
        default-action reject
        rule 1 {
            description 'Allow Internet to SSH to server3'
            action accept
            protocol tcp
            destination {
                address '2001:0DB8:DEAD::60'
                port 22
            }
        }
        rule 2 {
            description 'Allow Internet to ping LAN'
            action accept
            protocol icmp
        }
    }
    state-policy {
        established {
            action accept
        }
        related {
            action accept
        }
        invalid {
            action drop
        }
    }
}
